characters.currentChapter: The Adventure of the Great Departure
characters.name: Kazuma Asogi
characters.description1: A second year at the Imperial Yumei University. He's my best friend and, despite being a student, a qualified defense lawyer as well.

characters.currentChapter: The Adventure of the Great Departure
characters.name: Yujin Mikotoba
characters.description1: A medical professor at the Imperial Yumei University. He's an authority in forensic science, and Kazuma's mentor.

characters.currentChapter: The Adventure of the Great Departure
characters.name: Taketsuchi Auchi
characters.description1: The lead prosecutor of this case, who would appear to have little love for the changes the cultural reformation has brought about.

characters.currentChapter: The Adventure of the Great Departure
characters.name: John H. Wilson
characters.description1: The victim of this case. He was a visiting professor of medicine at Yumei University from the British Empire.

characters.currentChapter: The Adventure of the Great Departure
characters.name: Satoru Hosonaga
characters.description1: The head waiter of the European-style restaurant 'La Carneval'. He was serving there on the day of the incident.

characters.currentChapter: The Adventure of the Great Departure
characters.name: Iyesa Nosa
characters.description1: An army sergeant of the Empire of Japan who witnessed the incident.

characters.currentChapter: The Adventure of the Great Departure
characters.name: Kyurio Korekuta
characters.description1: The owner of 'Rasu-tei', who was hunting for a lost Hoei-era gold koban coin at the time of the incident.

characters.currentChapter: The Adventure of the Great Departure
characters.name: Jezaille Brett
characters.description1: A British exchange student who was studying under the victim at Yumei University's medical school.

characters.currentChapter: The Adventure of the Great Departure
characters.name: Susato Mikotoba
characters.description1: The judicial assistant of Defense Lawyer Kazuma Asogi.

chapter: The Adventure of the Unbreakable Speckled Band

characters.currentChapter: The Adventure of the Unbreakable Speckled Band
characters.name: Kazuma Asogi
characters.description1: A certified lawyer and my best friend. He was on his way to London for a study tour when he was taken from this world.

characters.currentChapter: The Adventure of the Unbreakable Speckled Band
characters.name: Susato Mikotoba
characters.description1: A judicial assistant who was travelling with Kazuma to London for a study tour. She is the epitome of a refined Japanese lady.

characters.currentChapter: The Adventure of the Unbreakable Speckled Band
characters.name: Herlock Sholmes
characters.description1: There's not a person in the world who hasn't heard of this famous 'great detective'. Not a person except me, apparently.

characters.currentChapter: The Adventure of the Unbreakable Speckled Band
characters.name: Satoru Hosonaga
characters.description1: A chief inspector in the Imperial Police Bureau who's on an undercover mission, posing as a member of the ship's crew.

characters.currentChapter: The Adventure of the Unbreakable Speckled Band
characters.name: Bif Strogenov
characters.description1: A real wall of a man and a senior member of the Russian crew who's in charge of security around the first-class cabins.

characters.currentChapter: The Adventure of the Unbreakable Speckled Band
characters.name: Grimesby Roylott → Nikolina Pavlova
characters.description1: An older Russian gentleman travelling on the ship. He's staying in the first-class cabin next to Kazuma's.
characters.description2: A young ballerina who's fled her homeland of Russia to escape the Novavich Ballet.

chapter: The Adventure of the Runaway Room

characters.currentChapter: The Adventure of the Runaway Room
characters.name: Susato Mikotoba
characters.description1: A judicial assistant sent to Britain on a study tour. She's the epitome of a refined Japanese lady and a huge help to me always.

characters.currentChapter: The Adventure of the Runaway Room
characters.name: Mael Stronghart
characters.description1: The Lord Chief Justice, who wields absolute authority in judicial matters, including the appointment of lawyers. He's a thoroughly intimidating man.

characters.currentChapter: The Adventure of the Runaway Room
characters.name: Magnus McGilded
characters.description1: The defendant in this case. He's an incredibly wealthy philanthropist with a wonderful reputation in London. I'm to defend him as a test of my worthiness to become a lawyer.

characters.currentChapter: The Adventure of the Runaway Room
characters.name: Barok van Zieks
characters.description1: A prosecutor known as the Reaper of the Bailey. Supposedly, the souls of those he prosecutes are eternally damned, one way or another.

characters.currentChapter: The Adventure of the Runaway Room
characters.name: 'Thrice-Fired' Mason
characters.description1: The victim. A skilled but poor brickmaker who apparently owed the defendant a considerable sum of money.

characters.currentChapter: The Adventure of the Runaway Room
characters.name: Beppo
characters.description1: The driver of the omnibus on which the murder took place. He's an eyewitness to the incident.

characters.currentChapter: The Adventure of the Runaway Room
characters.name: Bruce Fairplay
characters.description1: A gentleman who works as a city banker. He witnessed the incident from his seat on the roof deck of the omnibus.

characters.currentChapter: The Adventure of the Runaway Room
characters.name: Lay D. Furst
characters.description1: An apprentice milliner who witnessed the incident from his seat on the roof deck of the omnibus.

characters.currentChapter: The Adventure of the Runaway Room
characters.name: Gina Lestrade
characters.description1: A young woman who witnessed the incident from her hiding place aboard the omnibus on the night of the murder. She was discovered by the defendant.

chapter: The Adventure of the Clouded Kokoro

characters.currentChapter: The Adventure of the Clouded Kokoro
characters.name: Susato Mikotoba
characters.description1: A judicial assistant sent to Britain on a study tour. She's the epitome of a refined Japanese lady and a huge help to me always.

characters.currentChapter: The Adventure of the Clouded Kokoro
characters.name: Mael Stronghart
characters.description1: The Lord Chief Justice, who wields absolute authority in judicial matters, including the appointment of lawyers. He's a thoroughly intimidating man.

characters.currentChapter: The Adventure of the Clouded Kokoro
characters.name: Tobias Gregson
characters.description1: The detective inspector in charge of Scotland Yard's investigation of the case. He's stern and single-minded in his approach, and a great lover of fish and chips.

characters.currentChapter: The Adventure of the Clouded Kokoro
characters.name: Soseki Natsume
characters.description1: A scholar sent to Britain by the Japanese government to further his study of English. He's the defendant accused of attempted murder.

characters.currentChapter: The Adventure of the Clouded Kokoro
characters.name: Iris Wilson
characters.description1: An extraordinary young girl who lives with Mr Sholmes. She has a degree in medicine and is the author of a popular series of short stories.

characters.currentChapter: The Adventure of the Clouded Kokoro
characters.name: Maid → Joan Garrideb
characters.description1: A maid who works at the Garrideb household. Her main duty appears to be standing at Mr Garrideb's side pouring tea.
characters.description2: Mr Garrideb's wife, who poses as the household maid merely to keep up appearances in the neighborhood. She has a fierce temper and tends to get rather physical.
characters.description3: Mr Garrideb's wife, who poses as the household maid merely to keep up appearances in the neighborhood. She is in attendance today as a member of the jury.

characters.currentChapter: The Adventure of the Clouded Kokoro
characters.name: John Garrideb
characters.description1: A retired army man who's the landlord of the lodgings rented by the defendant, Mr Natsume. An old knee injury means he's confined to a chair most of the time.

characters.currentChapter: The Adventure of the Clouded Kokoro
characters.name: Herlock Sholmes
characters.description1: There's not a person in the world who hasn't heard of this famous 'great detective'. Not a person except me, apparently.

characters.currentChapter: The Adventure of the Clouded Kokoro
characters.name: Barok van Zieks
characters.description1: A prosecutor known as the Reaper of the Bailey, though concrete details of the man are not forthcoming.

characters.currentChapter: The Adventure of the Clouded Kokoro
characters.name: Olive Green
characters.description1: The victim of this case, who was found with a knife in her back. Luckily, the wound didn't prove fatal, but the woman remains unconscious in her hospital bed.

characters.currentChapter: The Adventure of the Clouded Kokoro
characters.name: Roly Beate
characters.description1: A devoted London bobby who witnessed the incident whilst walking down the street with his wife of a year, Patricia.

characters.currentChapter: The Adventure of the Clouded Kokoro
characters.name: Patricia Beate
characters.description1: The wife of Constable Roly Beate who is a witness to the incident. She's relatively recently married, and fiercely proud of her policeman husband.

chapter: The Adventure of the Unspeakable Story

characters.currentChapter: The Adventure of the Unspeakable Story
characters.name: Susato Mikotoba
characters.description1: A judicial assistant sent to Britain on a study tour. She's the epitome of a refined Japanese lady and a huge help to me always.

characters.currentChapter: The Adventure of the Unspeakable Story
characters.name: Herlock Sholmes
characters.description1: The world-famous 'great detective', above whose lodgings Miss Susato and I rent our own office and rooms.

characters.currentChapter: The Adventure of the Unspeakable Story
characters.name: Iris Wilson
characters.description1: An extraordinary young girl who lives with Mr Sholmes. She has a degree in medicine and is the author of a popular series of short stories.

characters.currentChapter: The Adventure of the Unspeakable Story
characters.name: Pop Windibank
characters.description1: The proprietor of a pawnbrokery on Baker Street that is regularly patronised by Mr Sholmes. He has a very great sense of responsibility to his clients.
characters.description2: The proprietor of a pawnbrokery on Baker Street that is regularly patronised by Mr Sholmes. He was shot dead by an unknown assailant.

characters.currentChapter: The Adventure of the Unspeakable Story
characters.name: Gina Lestrade
characters.description1: A young pickpocket who we first met during a trial two months ago. She and Iris have become firm friends since.
characters.description2: A young pickpocket who we first met during a trial two months ago. She's the defendant in this case, and was discovered at the scene of the crime alongside the victim.

characters.currentChapter: The Adventure of the Unspeakable Story
characters.name: Eggert Benedict → Ashley Graydon
characters.description1: A young English gentleman with an aloof and high-handed manner. He appeared at Windibank's pawnbrokery accusing Gina of stealing his redemption ticket.
characters.description2: A telegraph operator at the central communication system. He appeared at Windibank's pawnbrokery using the pseudonym Eggert Benedict.
characters.description3: A telegraph operator at the central communication system, whose last name was once Milverton years ago. He's a childhood friend of the Skulkin brothers.

characters.currentChapter: The Adventure of the Unspeakable Story
characters.name: Tobias Gregson
characters.description1: The detective inspector in charge of Scotland Yard's investigation of the case. He's stern and single-minded in his approach, and a great lover of fish and chips.

characters.currentChapter: The Adventure of the Unspeakable Story
characters.name: Mael Stronghart
characters.description1: The Lord Chief Justice, who wields absolute authority in judicial matters, including the appointment of lawyers. He's a thoroughly intimidating man.

characters.currentChapter: The Adventure of the Unspeakable Story
characters.name: Barok van Zieks
characters.description1: The infamous London-based prosecutor known as the Reaper of the Bailey. Further details about the man are not forthcoming.

characters.currentChapter: The Adventure of the Unspeakable Story
characters.name: Nash Skulkin
characters.description1: A witness to the event who broke into Windibank's on the night of the murder with his brother and accomplice Ringo. He claims to be a 'profeshnal baddie' by trade.

characters.currentChapter: The Adventure of the Unspeakable Story
characters.name: Ringo Skulkin
characters.description1: A witness to the event who broke into Windibank's on the night of the murder with his brother and accomplice Nash. He claims to be a 'profeshnal baddie' by trade.
